songs.title: Get Up/Like Nobody’s Around Remix
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]

It's time to get up, get up, get-get get up
If you're tired of waiting
It's time to get up, get up, get-get get up
We'll do it like nobody's around

[Verse 1: Carlos]

You're gonna love this, just wait
Take my hand don't hesitate
C'mon and follow my lead
I got a bag full of tricks come roll with me

[Verse 2: James]

I know you love this, let's go
Get there fast and we'll take it slow
We're gonna live out our dreams
You and me together, no make believe

[Pre-Chorus: Logan]

Turn up the radio
So what if we lose control
Get a little bit rock and roll
Oh woah

[Chorus]

[Verse 3: Kendall]

Want you to cry
Cause you're laughing so hard tonight
Playing air guitar alright
We're being who we are even if they hate that

[Verse 4: James]

Want you to shout
At the top of your lungs about
All our favorite songs so loud
We'll be singing along even if they hate that

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]
